Specimen Type: Fresh or adequately preserved tissue samples (e.g., lymph node, bone marrow)
Purpose: To generate immunophenotyping results for the diagnosis and classification of leukemia and lymphoma from tissue specimens.
Container: Sterile container with appropriate preservative/transport medium
Equipment: Flow cytometer, refrigerators (2-8 °C), incubators (37 °C), vortex mixer, centrifuge, micropipettes
